forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. High near 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 51F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain...mixing with snow in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening. A snow shower or two late - otherwise, mostly cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening. A snow shower or two late - otherwise, mostly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
